version_description:
The most user-requested features are here:
⌘ Configurable whitelist
⌘ Safari extension for in-place whitelisting and reporting
⌘ Fast filter auto-updates

Thank you for using Ad Block Multi! If you're enjoying Ad Block Multi, please take a minute to rate it here on the App Store, it really helps!

Many many LOVE touches:
* better offline support throughout the app (the Tube effect)
* 100% more accessible via VoiceOver
* better URL capturing when whitelisting from Safari extension
* iPad Pro support
* uncountable amount of under-the-hood optimizations

Thank you for using Ad Block Multi!
To help us grow and develop new app features, please take a moment to rate it on the App Store. It really helps, we love you!

Polish (I mean polishing) touches in this version:
* smoother iOS 10 experience
* faster updating, greased many gears under the hood

Thank you for using Ad Block Multi!
To help us grow and develop new app features, please take a moment to rate it on the App Store. You wouldn't believe how much it helps, we love you!

Polish (I mean polishing) touches in this version:
* smoother iOS 10 experience
* faster updating, greased many gears under the hood

Thank you for using Ad Block Multi!
To help us grow and develop new app features, please take a moment to rate it on the App Store. You wouldn't believe how much it helps, we love you!
